document.full_text: thousands of protesters gathered in a central square in madrid on wednesday night, despite an effort by electoral officials to impose a ban on demonstrations as spain prepares to vote in local elections this weekend.
document.title: the lede: protesters rally in madrid despite ban
lines_and_colors: thousands of protesters gathered in a central square in madrid on wednesday night, despite an effort by electoral officials to impose a ban on demonstrations as spain prepares to vote in local elections this weekend.
